name: Detroit-Style Coney Dogs
author: Ashley Schulte
summary: Where I come from no Tigers game is complete without a Detroit Coney. It's a grilled, natural-casing hot dog, loaded with chili sauce, mustard, and onions. Yummy...Detroit-style yummy!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can chile sauce without beans
4 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Place hot dogs on the grill; cook until browned, 5 to 8 minutes, turning once, or until done to suit your taste
Meanwhile, place the chile sauce in a small microwave-safe bowl; cook 1 minute
Top each with chile sauce, onion, and 1 tablespoon mustard, or to taste
